title: DeliveryMethodEnum
description: Specifies delivery methods for securities transactions. This coding-scheme defines the possible delivery methods for securities.

oneOf.title: DeliveryVersusPayment
oneOf.description: Indicates that a securities delivery must be made against payment in simultaneous transmissions and stipulate each other.

oneOf.title: FreeOfPayment
oneOf.description: Indicates that a securities delivery can be made without a simultaneous cash payment in exchange and not depending on if payment obligations are fulfilled or not and vice versa.

oneOf.title: PreDelivery
oneOf.description: Indicates that a securities delivery must be made in full before the payment for the securities; fulfillment of payment obligations depends on securities delivery obligations fulfillment.

oneOf.title: PrePayment
oneOf.description: Indicates that a payment in full amount must be made before the securities delivery; fulfillment of securities delivery obligations depends on payment obligations fulfillment.
